name: Loops & Lattes Hiking Guides Dufferin Hikes
description: A guide to 32 hiking loops around the quiet high country of Dufferin County, Ontario. All hikes start and end at the same point, and they vary in length from 2.2km to 21km. Dufferin Hikes' detailed entries for each loop include colour photos, map, length, level of difficulty, time needed, directions, places to eat and drink, and local lore.
